body:
The presidential campaign, the House hearings on Benghazi and more are scheduled for discussion on the Sunday news shows. Here are the guest lineups, as compiled by the Associated Press.
ABC’s “This Week”
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump.
NBC’s “Meet the Press”
Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson; Reps. Trey Gowdy (R., S.C.) and Elijah Cummings (D., Md.).
CBS’ “Face the Nation”
Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Chris Christie; Reps. Devin Nunes (R., Calif.) and Adam Schiff (D., Calif.).
CNN’s “State of the Union”
Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Marco Rubio; Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders.
“Fox News Sunday”
Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson; Rep. Jim Jordan (R., Ohio).

description: The presidential campaign, the House hearings on Benghazi and more are scheduled for discussion on the Sunday news shows.
title: Sunday Talk Preview: Presidential Campaign, Benghazi in Spotlight
